body:
With Form Builder, you can:

* create, edit and publish digital forms using GOV.UK templates and styles
* deploy forms to any environment
* collect users' information

[See how Form Builder works]( https://youtu.be/zGU_FoBQh-Q).
       
You don't need any technical knowledge to use Form Builder.

Download and install it for free using MOJ Self-service.

### Create forms quickly and easily

Without any technical knowledge, you can:

* create a variety of GOV.UK page templates (for example, start page, question page or check your answers)
* preview pages
* see your form pages as a logical flow
* test your form to get a user's view of filling it in
 * collect information users submit when filling in a form

### Customise your forms

Using the Form Builder editor, you can:

* edit your pages directly
* create a unique URL for each page 
* add multiple GOV.UK components to pages (for example, inset text, warning text, and panels for confirmation or results pages)
* set optional fields
* build a page flow to suit your service
* customise your users' journeys and what they see based on their answers  

### Simplify the publishing process

The Form Builder publisher allows you to:

* publish your forms in multiple environments - for development and testing
* create and change teams to help manage permissions
* automatically deploy forms without the need for a specific environment
* add a Google Analytics ID to track visits to your forms 
* check the availability of your published forms - health check

### Understand your users

With Form Builder, you can 

* collect information the user submits
* send this information as a completed PDF form to a specific address (for example, to a court email address)

### Queries and suggestions

You can [contact us](form-builder-team@digital.justice.gov.uk) for more detail about these features, or to suggest something you'd like Form Builder to offer. You can also ask us a question over our [Slack channel](https://mojdt.slack.com/messages/CE26QEL1Z/).
